comment: Recommended setup: Nebius (embeddings) + OpenRouter (chat) + Novita (reranking) with Provider Routing

openai.comment: Use OpenRouter with provider routing to force Nebius provider
Sort by throughput for chat performance

comment_alternatives.direct_nebius: To use Nebius directly (no routing), set baseUrl to https://api.studio.nebius.com/v1 and remove routing config
comment_alternatives.provider_routing_options: See PROVIDER_ROUTING.md for all available routing options: sort (price/throughput/latency), order (provider list), max_price, quantizations, etc.
